project_descr: To assist (GAM)  to achieve a climate-resilient and low-carbon future, and improve the quality of life for its citizens via targeted support for improved urban planning and interventions in the municipal buildings and street lighting sub-sectors.

outputs.output_descr: To assist (GAM)  to achieve a climate-resilient and low-carbon future, and improve the quality of life for its citizens via targeted support for improved urban planning and interventions in the municipal buildings and street lighting sub-sectors.

document_name: A Systemic Approach to Sustainable Urbanization and Resource Efficiency in Greater Amman Municipality (GAM)
International consultant to evaluate CPD outcome 2013-2017 on low carbon and climate resilient initiatives
